sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { getOrderDetails } from '../actions/orderActions' function OrderScreen() { const {id} = useParams() const dispatch = useDispatch() const navigate = useNavigate() const orderDetails = useSelector(state => state.orderDetails) const {error, order, loading} = orderDetails if(!loading && !error){ order.itemsPrice = order.orderItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0).toFixed(2) } const addPayPalScript = () =>{ const script = document.createElement('script') } useEffect(() => { if(!order || order._id !== Number(id)) dispatch(getOrderDetails(id)) }, [order, id]) return loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : (

Order: {order._id}

Shipping

Name: {order.user.name}

Email: {order.user.email}

Shipping: {order.shippingAddress.address}, {' '} {order.shippingAddress.city}, {' '} {order.shippingAddress.country}, {' '} {order.shippingAddress.postalCode}

{order.isDelivered ? Delivered on {order.deliveredAt} : Not Delivered}

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod}

{order.isPaid ? Paid on {order.paidAt} : Not Paid}

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? ( Order is empty ): ( {order.orderItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} ))} )}

Order Summary

Items: ${order.itemsPrice} Shipping: ${order.shippingPrice} Tax: ${order.taxPrice} Total: ${order.totalPrice}
); } export default OrderScreen
